details.description: Tom Armitage is a technologist and designer based in London. He makes tools, toys, and art out of hardware, software, and the network; he likes to think with his hands. He's worked on everything from a large-scale website to aggregate UK schools data to giant, multi-part games that span a Parisian art gallery; from bridges that talk on Twitter and cities that speak over SMS to laser-cut sculptures of actorsâ€™ movements.
